title: Horseshoe Crabs and Velvet Worms - The Story of the Animals and
description:
From one of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leading natural scientists and the acclaimed author of Trilobite!, Life: A Natural History of Four Billion Years of Life on Earth and Dry Storeroom No. 1 comes a fascinating chronicle of lifeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s history told not through the fossil record but through the stories of organisms that have survived, almost unchanged, throughout time. Evolution, it seems, has not completely obliterated its tracks as more advanced organisms have evolved; the history of life on earth is far olderÃ¢â‚¬â€and odderÃ¢â‚¬â€than many of us realize. 
 
Scattered across the globe, these remarkable plants and animals continue to mark seminal events in geological time.
